thread.title: Pantel Unveiled Penta T-Pad Ultra 4G at Rs.6,999
thread.title_full: Pantel Unveiled Penta T-Pad Ultra 4G at Rs.6,999

title: Pantel Unveiled Penta T-Pad Ultra 4G at Rs.6,999
text:
Pantel Unveiled Penta T-Pad Ultra 4G at Rs.6,999 15th, Oct 2015 12:15 PM View: 7 0 
Pantel Technologies has revealed its new budget line tablet, dubbed as Penta T-Pad Ultra 4G . The device is available via the online retailers, Homeshop 18 and Grabthefuture at Rs. 6,999 . The device will be available in Blue, Red and Grey color variant. This tablet is perhaps one of the cheapest tablet which offers 4G LTE.The Company is also offering a flip cover and a keyboard, free of cost with the tablet. It arrives with the dual SIM card slot underneath, which allows the user to use 2G/3G and 4G LTE networks respectively. The device features a 7-inch IPS display with a resolution of 1024*600 pixels and is powered by 1GHz quad core processor.Penta T-Pad Ultra 4G clubs a 1GB of RAM and have the internal storage of 8GB, which is further expandable via microSD card slot expansion. The tablet runs on the Android 5.1 Lollipop operating system and is backed by 3000mAh non removable battery.Before this month, Pantel Technology has launched Penta T-Pad WS802Q 3G tablet with voice calling facility at Rs. 6,999.At the launching event, Vijender Singh, Managing Director, Pantel Technologies said, "We have launched Penta T-Pad Ultra 4G to promote the digital India campaign. In the near future more similar products with the latest technology will be launched in Indian market. We want our products to reach one and all without compromising on their budget."On the camera side, the tablet sports an 8 megapixel camera at the rear end with LED flash and have a 5 megapixel camera at the front end for the selfies. For connectivity, it includes Dual SIM (4G+3G/2G), Bluetooth 4.0, Wi-Fi, OTG, and Micro-USB.
